channel.title: Documentation on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on OWASP ZAP

item.title: ZAP Internal Statistics
item.description: ZAP maintains internal statistics which can be accessed via the API. Key / Link Scope Type Description automation.spider.urls.added global counter The number of URLs added by the standard spider running in the automation framework domxss.attack.<vector> global counter The number of time the given DOM XSS attack vector was used domxss.
